text_id: Sesungguhnya Kami telah memberimu (Nabi Muhammad) nikmat yang banyak.
text_en: HAVE SURELY given you pre-eminence (in numbers and following);

text_id: Maka, laksanakanlah salat karena Tuhanmu dan berkurbanlah!
text_en: So serve your Lord with full dedication and sacrifice.

text_id: Sesungguhnya orang yang membencimu, dialah yang terputus (dari rahmat Allah).
text_en: It is surely your opponents whose line will come to end.
